definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: All the path, the wild goose south flies adopted a virtuous business of Huo China to say 1 time.
sentences.chinese: 一路上，雁南飛把收服霍華德的事情說了一遍。

sentences.english: Hurston published her first short stories at Howard University.
sentences.chinese: 赫斯特在霍華德大學發表了她的第一部短篇小說集。

sentences.english: Howard again overpowers the Lakers to pull down 19 rebounds in addition to his 19 points.
sentences.chinese: 霍華德19分19籃板的魔鬼數據再次凌虐了湖人。

sentences.english: And take a guess who tutored Dwight Howard this summer?
sentences.chinese: 猜猜今夏誰在指導霍華德？

sentences.english: Auf wiedersehen Lost his place to Tim Howard and took his gloves to Marseille.
sentences.chinese: 被霍華德搶走位置之後就去了馬賽。

sentences.english: Sergeant Howard was reduced to the ranks for disregard of orders.
sentences.chinese: 霍華德士官因爲違抗命令而被降爲小兵。

sentences.english: If you're reminded of Dwight Howard , you should be.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想起了德懷特霍華德，那很正常。

sentences.english: Dwight Howard said Wall needs to slow down, and that’s something he’ll learn as he matures.
sentences.chinese: 霍華德認爲沃爾得學會減速，當他成熟起來他會懂的。

sentences.english: Senators Wilson and Howard paired off on the revenue bill.
sentences.chinese: 參議員威爾遜和霍華德相約不參加對稅收案的投票。

sentences.english: Days went by, and Howard saw fewer and fewer roaches.
sentences.chinese: 日子一天天過去，霍華德家的蟑螂越來越少。

sentences.english: Afterwards he unexpectedly and unscrupulously kills Huo Hua virtuous and ruin corpse to put out a vestige.
sentences.chinese: 後來他竟然喪心病狂地殺死霍華德並毀屍滅跡。

sentences.english: JVG. Please, for the love of God, take Howard out.
sentences.chinese: 范甘迪，看在上帝的分上，讓霍華德下去吧。

sentences.english: And why is Juwon always trying to snatch the rebound away from his teammates?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼霍華德總是從他得隊友那裏掙籃板球呢？

sentences.english: Howard asked me to be one of those dozen bloggers.
sentences.chinese: 霍華德邀請我成爲這十幾個博主的一員。

sentences.english: A Democratic Washington would find Rudd more on its wavelength than Howard.
sentences.chinese: 民主黨控制的華盛頓將發現陸克文比霍華德更協調。

sentences.english: Dwight Howard had too much spicy curry chicken last night.
sentences.chinese: 霍華德昨晚吃了太多的香辣咖喱雞了。

definition: the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
Milton (name)/John Milton (1608-1674), English republican writer and poet, author of Paradise Lost
